news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Child Safety Center
news.description: The health and safety of a child are a priority for any parent. But it’s not always easy to protect your child, or to know what to do when something goes wrong. A new Child Safety center at Justia provides guidance for parents.

news.title: Lawyer Commercials From the Big Game
news.description: When it comes to the NFL’s biggest game of the year, the commercials are often just as much of a draw as the teams on the field. Read this article to check out some of the legal industry commercials that graced viewers’ screens this year!

news.title: Justia Legal Guides: Sports Law Center
news.description: Sports hold a special place in the hearts of millions of Americans. Many of us at Justia are passionate about our favorite teams. After another great Super Bowl, we wanted to share our Sports Law center with fellow fans.
